alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Cuyahoga; Holmes; Knox; Lorain; Medina; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:17AM EDT until April 01 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Lorain County in north central Ohio... Knox County in north central Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 300 AM EDT. * At 217 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Avon Lake to near Wakeman to near Cardington, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Wooster, Ashland, Mount Vernon, Vermilion, Millersburg, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon and Avon Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Cuyahoga; Holmes; Knox; Lorain; Medina; Wayne
